files.name: main.py
files.content:
import random
import sys

# This function is provided for you
def showDie( value ):

   dieTop = ",-----,\n"

   dieFaces=[ "|     |\n|  *  |\n|     |\n",
              "|*    |\n|     |\n|    *|\n",
              "|*    |\n|  *  |\n|    *|\n",
              "|*   *|\n|     |\n|*   *|\n",
              "|*   *|\n|  *  |\n|*   *|\n",
              "|*   *|\n|*   *|\n|*   *|\n" ]

   dieBottom="'-----'\n"

   print ( dieTop + dieFaces[ value-1 ] + dieBottom )

def rollDie():
  rolls = int( input("Number of rolls (0 to exit)?"))
  if(rolls==0):
    end=True
  while(end==True):
    continue
  count=rolls
  y=0
  while(count>0):
    x=random.randint(1,6)
    showDie(x)
    count=count-1
    y=y+x
  print("Total:",y)

while(True): 
  rollDie()
